body_html:
@QQRider just add this line to the example early at the top:
config = tf.contrib.learn.RunConfig(gpu_memory_fraction=0.05)
estimator = tf.contrib.learn.LinearRegressor(feature_columns=features, config=config)
The percentage depends on your card memory... my card had only a small fraction free so I used this small number and the example worked fine (also added the print statement as it was suggested).
@gunan For new users of the framework I suggest strongly to update the docs (if the info is missing) for both issues.
